title: Xamarin.forms shared project gives error while creation
content:
Whenever I try to create a new xamarin.forms project it is giving error. The Error Details is as below,
Xamarin.Forms.1.3.1.6296: Could not install package 'Xamarin.Forms 1.3.1.6296'. You are trying to install this package into a project that targets 'Xamarin.iOS,Version=v1.0', but the pa
